meanings.definition: The part of the body on which one sits; the buttocks.
meanings.sent1: She landed on her tush after slipping on the ice.
meanings.sent2: The baby giggled while bouncing on his tush.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's tush wiggled as it chased its tail.
meanings.sent4: The squirrel stored nuts in its tush for winter.
meanings.sent5: The toddler's chubby tush left prints on the sand.

meanings.definition: A projection at the back of a chair seat.
meanings.sent1: The antique chair had a delicate tush carved into the wood.
meanings.sent2: The cushioned tush of the chair provided extra comfort.
meanings.sent3: The tush of the chair made it look elegant and stylish.
meanings.sent4: The tush of the chair resembled a small, rounded hill.
meanings.sent5: The tush of the chair prevented it from sliding on the floor.
